page.title: 19POLITICS/BELIEFS ON SCORAIG
page.content: MOST PEOPLE WHO HAVE COME TO LIVE ON SCORAIG HAVE DONE SO BECAUSE THEY ARE INDEPENDENT MINDED.THEY ENJOY WORKING ON THEIR OWN TO PRODUCE DEFINITE RESULTS FOR THEMSELVES AND THEIR FAMILIES.MOST,BUT NOT ALL, WOULD BE HAPPY TO STAY ON SCORAIG.NOT ALL PICKED SCORAIG BECAUSE OF ITS ISOLATED POSITION.MOST OF THE YOUNG PEOPLE WHO GREW UP ON SCORAIG WANT AT LEAST TO TRY LIFE IN OTHER PLACES BEFORE THEY CHOOSE TO SETTLE THERE. THERE ARE VERY FEW PEOPLE ON SCORAIG WHO BELONG TO A RELIGIOUS GROUP.MANY PEOPLE ARE AGNOSTIC. POLITICAL BELIEFS ON THE WHOLE ARE LEFT OF CENTRE AND THERE IS STRONG SUPPORT FOR C.N.D.
